verses.verse: And <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G2597>come<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G1849>power;<s%> and the <S%G1093>earth<s%> was <S%G5461>lightened<s%> with his <S%G1391>glory.<s%>

And he <S%G2896>cried<s%> <S%G1722>mightily<s%> <S%G2479><s%> with a <S%G3173>strong<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G897>Babylon<s%> the <S%G3173>great<s%> is <S%G4098>fallen,<s%> is <S%G4098>fallen,<s%> and is <S%G1096>become<s%> the <S%G2732>habitation<s%> of <S%G1142>devils,<s%> and the <S%G5438>hold<s%> of <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G169>foul<s%> <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> and a <S%G5438>cage<s%> of <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G169>unclean<s%> and <S%G3404>hateful<s%> <S%G3732>bird.<s%>

For <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%> have drunk of the <S%G3631>wine<s%> of the <S%G2372>wrath<s%> of her <S%G4202>fornication,<s%> and the <S%G935>kings<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> have <S%G4203>committed<s%> <S%G4203>fornication<s%> with her, and the <S%G1713>merchants<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> are <S%G4147>waxed<s%> <S%G4147>rich<s%> <S%G1537>through<s%> the <S%G1411>abundance<s%> of her <S%G4764>delicacies.<s%>

And I <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1831>Come<s%> out of her, my <S%G2992>people,<s%> that you be not <S%G4790>partakers<s%> of her <S%G266>sins,<s%> and that you <S%G2983>receive<s%> not of her <S%G4127>plagues.<s%>
For her <S%G266>sins<s%> have <S%G190>reached<s%> to <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> and <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G3421>remembered<s%> her <S%G92>iniquities.<s%>

<S%G591>Reward<s%> her <S%G2532>even<s%> as she <S%G591>rewarded<s%> you, and <S%G1363>double<s%> to her <S%G3588>double<s%> <S%G1362><s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to her <S%G2041>works:<s%> in the <S%G4221>cup<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> she has <S%G2767>filled<s%> <S%G2767>fill<s%> to her <S%G1362>double.<s%>

<S%G3745>How<s%> <S%G3745>much<s%> she has <S%G1392>glorified<s%> <S%G1438>herself,<s%> and lived <S%G4763>deliciously,<s%> <S%G5118>so<s%> <S%G5118>much<s%> <S%G929>torment<s%> and <S%G3997>sorrow<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> her: for she <S%G3004>said<s%> in her <S%G2588>heart,<s%> I <S%G2521>sit<s%> a <S%G938>queen,<s%> and <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5503>widow,<s%> and shall <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G3364>no<s%> <S%G3997>sorrow.<s%>

<S%G5124>Therefore<s%> shall her <S%G4127>plagues<s%> <S%G2240>come<s%> in <S%G3391>one<s%> <S%G2250>day,<s%> <S%G2288>death,<s%> and <S%G3997>mourning,<s%> and <S%G3042>famine;<s%> and she shall be <S%G2618>utterly<s%> <S%G2618>burned<s%> with <S%G4442>fire:<s%> for <S%G2478>strong<s%> is the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2919>judges<s%> her.

And the <S%G935>kings<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> have <S%G4203>committed<s%> <S%G4203>fornication<s%> and lived <S%G4763>deliciously<s%> with her, shall <S%G2799>mourn<s%> her, and <S%G2875>lament<s%> for her, <S%G3752>when<s%> they shall <S%G991>see<s%> the <S%G2586>smoke<s%> of her <S%G4451>burning,<s%>

<S%G2476>Standing<s%> <S%G3113>afar<s%> <S%G575>off<s%> for the <S%G5401>fear<s%> of her <S%G929>torment,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3759>Alas,<s%> <S%G3759>alas<s%> that <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G897>Babylon,<s%> that <S%G2478>mighty<s%> <S%G4172>city!<s%> for in <S%G3391>one<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> is your <S%G2920>judgment<s%> <S%G2064>come.<s%>

And the <S%G1713>merchants<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> shall <S%G2799>weep<s%> and <S%G3996>mourn<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> her; for <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G59>buys<s%> their <S%G1117>merchandise<s%> <S%G3765>any<s%> <S%G3765>more:<s%>

The <S%G1117>merchandise<s%> of <S%G5557>gold,<s%> and <S%G696>silver,<s%> and <S%G5093>precious<s%> <S%G3037>stones,<s%> and of <S%G3135>pearls,<s%> and fine <S%G1040>linen,<s%> and <S%G4209>purple,<s%> and <S%G4596>silk,<s%> and <S%G2847>scarlet,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2367>thyine<s%> <S%G3586>wood,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> manner <S%G4632>vessels<s%> of <S%G1661>ivory,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> manner <S%G4632>vessels<s%> of most <S%G5093>precious<s%> <S%G3586>wood,<s%> and of <S%G5475>brass,<s%> and <S%G4604>iron,<s%> and <S%G3139>marble,<s%>

And <S%G2792>cinnamon,<s%> and <S%G2368>odors,<s%> and <S%G3464>ointments,<s%> and <S%G3030>frankincense,<s%> and <S%G3631>wine,<s%> and <S%G1637>oil,<s%> and <S%G4585>fine<s%> <S%G4585>flour,<s%> and <S%G4621>wheat,<s%> and <S%G2934>beasts,<s%> and <S%G4263>sheep,<s%> and <S%G2462>horses,<s%> and <S%G4480>chariots,<s%> and <S%G4983>slaves,<s%> and <S%G5590>souls<s%> of <S%G444>men.<s%>

And the <S%G3703>fruits<s%> that your <S%G5590>soul<s%> <S%G1937>lusted<s%> after are <S%G565>departed<s%> from you, and <S%G3956>all<s%> things <S%G3588>which<s%> were <S%G3045>dainty<s%> and <S%G2986>goodly<s%> are <S%G565>departed<s%> from you, and you shall <S%G2147>find<s%> them <S%G3364>no<s%> <S%G3765>more<s%> at <S%G3364>all.<s%>

The <S%G1713>merchants<s%> of <S%G5130>these<s%> things, <S%G3588>which<s%> were <S%G4147>made<s%> <S%G4147>rich<s%> by her, shall <S%G2476>stand<s%> <S%G3113>afar<s%> <S%G575>off<s%> for the <S%G5401>fear<s%> of her <S%G929>torment,<s%> <S%G2799>weeping<s%> and <S%G3996>wailing,<s%>

And <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3759>Alas,<s%> alas <S%G3759><s%>that <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> that was <S%G4016>clothed<s%> in fine <S%G1039>linen,<s%> and <S%G4210>purple,<s%> and <S%G2847>scarlet,<s%> and <S%G5558>decked<s%> with <S%G5557>gold,<s%> and <S%G5093>precious<s%> <S%G3037>stones,<s%> and <S%G3135>pearls!<s%>

For in <S%G3391>one<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G5118>so<s%> <S%G5118>great<s%> <S%G4149>riches<s%> is <S%G2049>come<s%> to <S%G2049>nothing.<s%> And <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G2942>shipmaster,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3658>company<s%> in <S%G4143>ships,<s%> and <S%G3492>sailors,<s%> and as <S%G3745>many<s%> as <S%G2038>trade<s%> by <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G3113>afar<s%> <S%G575>off,<s%>

And <S%G2896>cried<s%> when they <S%G3708>saw<s%> the <S%G2586>smoke<s%> of her <S%G4451>burning,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> is <S%G3664>like<s%> to this <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4172>city!<s%>

And they <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G5522>dust<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> their <S%G2776>heads,<s%> and <S%G2896>cried,<s%> <S%G2799>weeping<s%> and <S%G3996>wailing,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3759>Alas,<s%> alas <S%G3759><s%>that <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G1722>wherein<s%> <S%G3757><s%> were <S%G4147>made<s%> <S%G4147>rich<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G4143>ships<s%> in the <S%G2281>sea<s%> by <S%G1537>reason<s%> of her <S%G5094>costliness!<s%> for in one <S%G5610>hour<s%> is she <S%G2049>made<s%> <S%G2049>desolate.<s%>

<S%G2165>Rejoice<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> her, you <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> and you <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G652>apostles<s%> and <S%G4396>prophets;<s%> for <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G2919>avenged<s%> you <S%G1537>on<s%> her.

And a <S%G2478>mighty<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G142>took<s%> up a <S%G3037>stone<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3458>millstone,<s%> and <S%G906>cast<s%> it <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3779>Thus<s%> with <S%G3731>violence<s%> shall that <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G897>Babylon<s%> be <S%G906>thrown<s%> down, and shall be <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3364>no<s%> <S%G2089>more<s%> at <S%G3364>all.<s%>

And the <S%G5456>voice<s%> of <S%G2790>harpers,<s%> and <S%G3451>musicians,<s%> and of <S%G834>pipers,<s%> and <S%G4538>trumpeters,<s%> shall be <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3364>no<s%> <S%G2089>more<s%> at <S%G3364>all<s%> in you; and <S%G3956>no<s%> <S%G3364><s%> <S%G5079>craftsman,<s%> of <S%G3956>whatever<s%> <S%G5078>craft<s%> he be, shall be <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G2089>any<s%> <S%G2089>more<s%> in you; and the <S%G5456>sound<s%> of a <S%G3458>millstone<s%> shall be <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3364>no<s%> <S%G2089>more<s%> at <S%G3364>all<s%> in you;

And the <S%G5457>light<s%> of a <S%G3088>candle<s%> shall <S%G5316>shine<s%> <S%G3364>no<s%> <S%G2089>more<s%> at <S%G3364>all<s%> in you; and the <S%G5456>voice<s%> of the <S%G3566>bridegroom<s%> and of the <S%G3565>bride<s%> shall be <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3364>no<s%> <S%G2089>more<s%> at <S%G3364>all<s%> in you: for your <S%G1713>merchants<s%> were the <S%G3175>great<s%> men of the <S%G1093>earth;<s%> for by your <S%G5331>sorceries<s%> were <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%> <S%G4105>deceived.<s%>
And in her was <S%G2147>found<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> and of <S%G40>saints,<s%> and of <S%G3956>all<s%> that were <S%G4969>slain<s%> on the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>
